description: Extends missionlist by some cool Features!
name: Extended Missionlist

averageCredits.description: Shows the average earnable credits for each mission in a compact way.
averageCredits.title: Show avg. credits

collapsableMissions.description: Collapse individual (or all) missions to reduce their size in mission list.
collapsableMissions.title: Collapse missions

collapsableMissionsAllBtn.description: Shows a button to collapse all missions at once
collapsableMissionsAllBtn.title: Collapse all missions at once

currentPatients.description: Shows current amount of patients for each mission
currentPatients.title: Current Patients

currentPatientsInTooltips.description: Shows current amount of patients also in the tooltips on the map.
currentPatientsInTooltips.title: Current Patients in Tooltips

currentPrisoners.description: Shows current amount of prisoners for each mission
currentPrisoners.title: Current Prisoners

currentPrisonersInTooltips.description: Shows current amount of prisoners also in the tooltips on the map.
currentPrisonersInTooltips.title: Current Prisoners in Tooltips

eventMissions.description: Marks seasonal missions. Optionally, you can customise the whole thing and also mark non-seasonal missions.
eventMissions.title: Mark seasonal missions

fixedEventInfo.description: Displays the info about a running event permanently, no matter how far you have scrolled in the missions list.
fixedEventInfo.title: Always show event info

hide0CurrentPatients.description: Hides amount of patients if there are no patients at scene
hide0CurrentPatients.title: Hide 0 Patients

hide0CurrentPrisoners.description: Hides amount of prisoners if there are no prisoners at scene
hide0CurrentPrisoners.title: Hide 0 Prisoners

remainingPatientTime.description: Shows for patients how much time remains until they are fully treated
remainingPatientTime.title: Remaining time for patients

remainingPumpingTime.description: Shows for pumping progresses how much time remains until they are finished.
remainingPumpingTime.title: Remaining time for pumping progress

remainingTime.description: Shows at missions how long each mission still is in progress.
remainingTime.title: Remaining Missiontime

remainingTimeGreenOnly.description: Show remaining Time on green missions only.
remainingTimeGreenOnly.title: Missiontime for green missions only

shareMissions.description: Share missions with the alliance directly from the mission list.
shareMissions.title: Share missions

shareMissionsButtonColor.description: Select the background color of the share buttons
shareMissionsButtonColor.title: Share missions: Button color

shareMissionsMinCredits.description: The button for sharing a mission is only shown for missions that do have an average reward of more than what you've set here.
shareMissionsMinCredits.title: Share missions: minimum credits

shareMissionsTypes.description: Set up which of the calls you want to enable the share button for.
shareMissionsTypes.title: Share missions: mission types

sortMissionsButtonColor.description: Select the background color of the sorting button
sortMissionsButtonColor.title: Sort missions: Button color

sortMissionsInMissionwindow.description: Implements the sorting in mission windows. Optionally, you may set custom Hotkeys in our Module "Hotkeys" for the modified buttons.
sortMissionsInMissionwindow.title: Sorting in mission window

starrableMissions.description: Mark missions so that they are be displayed in the mission list at the top. You can mark them in the mission window and in the mission list.
starrableMissions.title: Mark Missions
